definition: family firm producing a special product/cottage industry
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: I say 99 percent of repeat petitioners are mentally ill.
sentences.chinese: 我敢说99%的上访专业户精神有问题。

sentences.english: You'd think she'd be a pro by now, but I don't know.
sentences.chinese: 你会认为她现在都成结婚专业户了，但我真的不确定。

sentences.english: 'Bad-tempered? I'm a pussycat, ' insists the older, mellower king of trophy jungle.
sentences.chinese: “坏脾气？我是很温柔的，”这位冠军专业户说。

sentences.english: Are you sure you wanna invite this party pooper to poop on your party?
sentences.chinese: 你确定你想邀请这个派对扫兴专业户去扫兴吗？

definition: not just in name only, but also in reality (idiom)
to win instant success (idiom)/to become an instant hit
(neologism c. 2009) don't worry, it's all taken care of
to buy soy sauce/it's none of my business ("I’m just here to buy some soy sauce")
to enter deeply into people's hearts/to have a real impact on the people (idiom)
supporting role (in play, film etc)/minor role/to play a secondary role (in business etc)/to play second fiddle
the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
